mapper.insert: INSERT INTO edms ( edms_id, form_id, edms_c_id, com_id, state_code, edms_title, edms_content, submit_date, ref_dept, reject_reason, level1, level2, level3, level4, final_level, start_date, end_date ) VALUES ( EDMS_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{formId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{edmsCId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{comId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{stateCode, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{edmsTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edmsContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{refDept, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rejectReason, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level1, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level2, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level3, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level4, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finalLevel, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate, jdbcType=DATE} )
mapper.select: SELECT e.edms_id AS edmsId, e.form_id AS formId, e.edms_c_id AS edmsCId, e.com_id AS comId, e.state_code AS stateCode, e.edms_title AS edmsTitle, e.edms_content AS edmsContent, e.submit_date AS submitDate, e.ref_dept AS refDept, e.reject_reason AS rejectReason, e.level1 AS level1, e.level2 AS level2, e.level3 AS level3, e.level4 AS level4, e.final_level AS finalLevel, e.start_date AS startDate, e.end_date AS endDate, f.form_name AS formName, emp.emp_name AS drafter_name FROM edms e JOIN edms_form f ON e.form_id = f.form_id JOIN employee emp ON e.com_id = emp.emp_code_id WHERE (e.level1 = #{empCodeId} OR e.level2 = #{empCodeId} OR e.level3 = #{empCodeId} OR e.level4 = #{empCodeId} OR e.final_level = #{empCodeId}) AND e.state_code IN (1, 2) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM edms_history h WHERE h.edms_id = e.edms_id AND h.approver_id = #{empCodeId} )

SELECT e.edms_id AS edmsId, e.form_id AS formId, e.edms_c_id AS edmsCId, e.com_id AS comId, e.state_code AS stateCode, e.edms_title AS edmsTitle, e.edms_content AS edmsContent, e.submit_date AS submitDate, e.ref_dept AS refDept, e.reject_reason AS rejectReason, e.level1 AS level1, e.level2 AS level2, e.level3 AS level3, e.level4 AS level4, e.final_level AS finalLevel, e.start_date AS startDate, e.end_date AS endDate, f.form_name AS formName, emp.emp_name AS drafterName FROM edms e JOIN edms_form f ON e.form_id = f.form_id JOIN employee emp ON e.com_id = emp.emp_code_id WHERE e.com_id = #{empCodeId}

SELECT e.edms_id AS edms_id, e.form_id AS form_id, e.edms_c_id AS edms_c_id, e.com_id AS com_id, e.state_code AS state_code, e.edms_title AS edms_title, e.edms_content AS edms_content, e.submit_date AS submit_date, e.ref_dept AS ref_dept, e.reject_reason AS reject_reason, e.level1 AS level1, e.level2 AS level2, e.level3 AS level3, e.level4 AS level4, e.final_level AS final_level, e.start_date AS start_date, e.end_date AS end_date, f.form_name AS form_name, emp.emp_name AS drafter_name FROM edms e JOIN edms_form f ON e.form_id = f.form_id JOIN employee emp ON e.com_id = emp.emp_code_id WHERE e.edms_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO edms_history ( history_id, edms_id, approver_id, action, step_level, reason, action_date ) VALUES ( EDMS_HIST_SEQ.nextval, #{edmsId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{approverId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{action, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepLevel, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{reason, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT history_id AS historyId, edms_id AS edmsId, approver_id AS approverId, action, step_level AS stepLevel, reason, action_date AS actionDate FROM edms_history WHERE edms_id = #{docId} ORDER BY step_level ASC, action_date ASC
